properties.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 29 at 2:33PM PST until March 1 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches.
Greater amounts in the highest elevations. Winds gusting as high
as 50 mph.

* WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 4 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery, snow-covered road conditions and
reduced visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches
and cause isolated power outages.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads
and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY
